content: purchase 2 patterns get 10% off purchase 3 patterns get 15% off no code necessary the mimosa head wrap is such a cute accessory and quick project you are going to want one in every color there are so many ways to wear it just google ways to wear a scarf in your hair you could pick a different tutorial every day for the rest of the summer your finished wrap should measure approx 40 long and 2 1/2 wide however it is easy to adjust your beginning chain and the number of row to get any size you want just make sure you chain an even number it is a beginner friendly pattern using chains and single crochet stitches i left mine unblocked however blocking it would help keep the stitches open and give it a more lacy look you will need yarn - approx yards of dk weight 3 cotton yarn yarn pictured - cascade ultra pima colors coral cloud #3827 and periwinkle #3726 any dk cotton should work hook - u s h/5 0 mm needle for weaving in ends
